name: YT channel DL
description: A Telegram bot to download youtube channel contents and upload them to telegram.

LOG_CHNL.description: A channel or group ID to log user activities.

UPDTE_CHNL.description: Channel username(without @) to work force sub! Bot should be admin in ur chnl

USE_HEROKU.description: Don't change this. Else bot will crash!
